General.Name: Izocam Ticaret ve Sanayi Anonim Sirketi
General.Description: Izocam Ticaret ve Sanayi Anonim Sirketi produces and sells glass wool, stone wool, extruded polystyrene foam board, expanded polystyrene and panel, elastomeric rubber, and polyethylene products. The company's products are used in insulation applications, such as roofs, walls, floors, HVACs, industrials, technical, and other applications, as well as used in multi comfort houses. It exports its products to 46 countries mainly in Balkans, Commonwealth of Independent States, Turkic Republics, the Middle East, and Africa. The company was founded in 1965 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey. Izocam Ticaret ve Sanayi Anonim Sirketi is a subsidiary of Izocam Holding Anonim Sirketi.
